backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing products, carts, orders, loyalty points, redemptions, user profiles, and admin bootstrap via AccessControl.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor state and passthrough run function returning unchanged state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence document listing a frontend bootstrap-claim update with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, auth, admin workflow, and product/cart logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light/dark modes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes inside a shared AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Auth/admin gate handling II login, admin checks, bootstrap claim with password, error states, and debug panel.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Simple authentication gate requiring Internet Identity login before showing children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login button triggering Internet Identity authentication with loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save it.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccountSu: Displays user profile info, points, navigation links, and handles logout via Internet Identity.
Provides the main layout with header, navigation, footer, profile setup, and account controls.
frontend/src/components/SupportWhatsAppL: Reusable WhatsApp support link button with customizable message, label, and styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUnlock.ts: Manages admin unlock state using a fixed password and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart queries and mutations including fetching, adding, removing items, and placing orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context for login, logout, stored identity handling, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Offers product-related queries and mutations including fetching, creating, updating, and toggling products.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and mutate user profile, admin status, bootstrap availability, and caller principal using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements admin login flow using a password unlock and conditionally renders the admin product panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Displays and manages products with create, edit, and activation toggles, using admin authentication and product mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user's cart with product details, totals, and remove/checkout actions, using cart and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Renders the product catalog with search, category filtering, admin check, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders the checkout flow, showing cart items, totals, and placing orders with navigation to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmation message after an order is placed and links to shopping or rewards.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder for future order history functionality behind an auth gate.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with images and allows authenticated users to add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows the user's points balance and allows redeeming rewards when enough points are available.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state for building the Ryk Cart e‑commerce app, including admin password-only access, loyalty points rules, WhatsApp support, and known issues about the blocked admin panel.
